author: nc1234
content: Do we want to freeze a beacon API version for devnet 0 similar to what execution api does here? https://notes.ethereum.org/@ethpandaops/pectra-devnet-0 because EIP-7549 requires a change to attestation apis

author: nflaig
content: what do you mean by freeze?

author: nc1234
content: I mean just publish a version that every client team works towards for the sake of devnet 0

author: nflaig
content: ah you mean in terms of spec? I guess the most imortant onces to have is attestation and aggregated? others a kinda optional for now

author: nc1234
content: Yea exactly. Or else something would break if we use different client on vc/bn pairs and things would break due to the different endpoint formats
